message_1:
A company wants to analyze the sales data of their products. They have collected data on the number of units sold for 10 products over the last 6 months. Using data mining techniques, the company wants to find out:

- The average number of units sold per month for all the products combined
- The product with the highest average number of units sold per month
- The product with the lowest average number of units sold per month

Can you use your knowledge of statistics and data mining to help the company answer these questions?
message_2: Yes, I can help the company answer these questions. To do this, I will need the data on the number of units sold for each of the 10 products over the last 6 months. Once I have this data, I can calculate the required statistics. Please provide the data.
